attributes.action: Shut down Top Gear, First 3 mins of the first episode is very racist.
attributes.background:
The new series of Top Gear started this evening, 8PM 29th 5th 2016.

In the first 3 minutes of the episode, they see just how many indians they can put on one car.

This is a thousand times more racist than anything the BBC has claimed that Jeremy Clarkson has done..

rejection.details:
The BBC is an independent body governed by a Royal Charter. Under the terms of that Charter, the BBC is operationally and editorially independent of government and there is no provision for the government to intervene in the BBC’s day-to-day operations.
